ack.p: The authors would like to acknowledge Jen Cukrovany, New York State Department of Health, for her HIV surveillance systems subject matter expertise, Bridget Anderson and Brenda Moncur, New York State Department of Health, for overseeing the registry matching, Srikanth Bomma, New York State Department of Health, for his assistance with data management, and both the Bureau of HIV/AIDS Epidemiology, and the Bureau of Sexual Health and Epidemiology, New York State Department of Health, for their commitment to surveillance thereby making this project possible. We would additionally like to thank the Partner Services field staff from the New York State Department of Health and the Albany, Dutchess, Erie, Monroe, Nassau, Onondaga, Orange, Suffolk and Westchester local Health Departments for their skill and persistence with conducting high quality disease intervention efforts.
